meta.description: ORY Gatekeeper works like a firewall for your APIs. We detect and prevent malicious requests and make sure that no unauthorized request reaches your servers.
meta.title: ORY Gatekeeper - Protect Your API With OAuth2 In Minutes

nodes.text: DON'T REINVENT API ACCESS CONTROL.
PROTECT YOUR APIs WITH OAuth2 and OPENID Connect IN MINUTES.
Protect your APIs from attackers
ORY Gatekeeper works like a firewall for your APIs. We detect and prevent malicious requests and make sure that no unauthorized request reaches your servers.
Works with every existing system
Are you using hosted identity solutions like Auth0 or AWS Cognito? Are you running your own identity management solution?
No problem, ORY Gatekeeper protects you no matter how your authentication process looks like. You only need one line of code and we will do the rest.

state.html: <iframe src="counter.html" style="border: 0; outline: 0; width: 100%; height: auto; max-height: 90px;" onload="resizeIframe(this)"></iframe>

nodes.text: Charge for calls to your API
Connect your Stripe account and start charging money for API use. Create subscription plans or set up pay-per-use in no time.
Use one protocol for all use cases
Authorize requests from browsers, native mobile apps, IoT devices, and even third party apps within minutes, using a battle-tested and popular protocol: OAuth 2.0.
Become an social login provider like Google, Facebook, or LinkedIn with the identity federation standard OpenID Connect.
Easy administration
Our comprehensible administrator console makes it easy to configure the environment and set up rules.
Comprehensive reporting
Receive real-time statistics on business processes, transactions and security incidents. Compile comprehensive executive summaries for swift reviews.
OPEN SOURCE
We open source all our software products and are thankful for the vivid community that helps making these products great.
Security & Longevity
Security first
We use NIST (USA) & BSI (GER) approved cryptography and sophisticated security designs to prevent common and uncommon attack types.
No vendor lock-in
Our technology is open source with vivid communities and migration to open source is possible.
Trusted
Companies of all sizes trust our open source ecosystem. We secure over 400.000 requests each day.
For developers
By developers
Integrate immediately

ranges.text: Our API is a real time-saver. It consists of only one method:
. You will call this method from your log in endpoint, to let us know who is trying to get authorization.

nodes.text: Don't worry about access control
You can trust us to only let users past who present proper authorization. Gone are the days where you have to deal with ACL, RBAC and other funkyness. Simply build your app.
For easy processing, you receive user information via HTTP headers.
Works everywhere
The protocols we use have libraries in any major programming language. Authorizing users on the client side is a breeze. This particular example uses
passportjs
passport.authenticate('oauth2');
Detailed documentation available soon.
PRICING
Plan ahead with our transparent pricing policy and experiment with the platform using the free plan.
